outside of plugins, palettes and other i: I've written several custom JavaScript macros for my own needs e.g.working with dates (countdown to date, countup from date, days between two dates, display date n days from today), displaying timers, generating daily todo lists, and generating svg graphs from tables
what are we doing well? prompts for thin: I don't have a lot of interaction with the project and community, but when I periodically update my wikis it always feels like improvements have been made
what could we do better? prompts for thi: In terms of what might encourage me to contribute to the project: the macros & tools I've written for myself seem a bit too esoteric, and probably built in non-standard / hacky ways, to be useful to the wider community. If there was a simple, central way to share custom macros I might be encouraged to tidy them up for public consumption!
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
